lunch.description: Tomato, crumbled bleu cheese and local hand-chopped field greens
Hand-breaded chicken tenders on our fresh field greens with aged cheddar, local diced tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onion
Fresh, crisp romaine lettuce with tasty parmesan, sliced cherry tomatoes, grated parmesan cheese, housemade croutons, and creamy caesar dressing. Add chicken or shrimp for an additional charge.

Fresh mixed greens topped with generous helpings of green and yellow peppers, cucumbers, shaved carrots, red onion, cherry tomatoes, chickpea, and sliced hard-boiled egg. Drizzled with your choice of dressing
Fresh arugula, strawberries, grapes, mandarin oranges, oven-roasted pecans, red onion, feta, drizzled with our homemade raspberry vinaigrette. Local ingredients as available.
A Bernstein & Co. lunch classic. Burger made to order, served on toasted bun, packed with flavor. Served with fries
Half-pound burger on a toasted bun packed with aged cheddar, spinach, hand-battered onion rings, and our special bacon mayo
Grilled chicken breast, avocado, tomato, aged cheddar, and ranch. A customer favorite! Served with fries

dinner.description: House made chicken salad with cranberries, slivered almonds, halved grapes, and celery. Served on toasted sourdough bread
A high-quality steak on a warm ciabatta roll with crispy applewood smoked bacon, aged cheddar, and bacon mayo
Roast beef sandwich on rye bread with Havarti cheese, ranch, and green leaf lettuce
Served on a ciabatta roll and topped with onions, mushrooms, and Swiss cheese
Grilled salmon drizzled in lemon and served between two slices of toasted sourdough bread, with our tangy, house made mayo.
Served with artichoke hearts, sauteed mushrooms, and roasted red peppers and tomatoes
Premier-quality chicken breast coated in tasty parmesan. Served with your choice of rice pilaf or couscous and roasted vegetables.
Served with smoky tomato butter and your choice of rice pilaf or couscous

Featuring a flavorful four cheese blend

A heaping plate of classic french fries. Crispy. Salty. Delicious. Served with an array of dipping sauces

Hand-battered and fried chicken tenders. A customer favorite.
Fresh greens and vegetables with your choice of dressing
